feedback:
As a crypto enthusiast and auditor, here’s my honest opinion about your Fox24Coin website:

What works well:
The messaging is strong: “Bridging Trust and Technology” immediately sets a tone of credibility.
Transparency in showing contract address, tokenomics, and roadmap is a big plus.
Visually, the site is clean — minimal clutter, good use of whitespace, logical sections (Home, Tokenomics, Roadmap, Team, etc.).
Security and protection features, such as references to audits and use of Cloudflare (as you mentioned before), help build trust.
The responsiveness and layout seem well done — mobile and desktop likely both work decently.
The navigation is intuitive and consistent; it’s easy to find token metrics, smart contract, roadmap.
suggestion:
Load times & performance metrics
Some widgets or live data (e.g. “Price: Loading…”) may slow down initial load.Consider lazy loading elements, optimizing images, or caching.
More contextual content & storytelling
While technicals are strong, more human stories (why this project, founder journey) could deepen connection.
Add testimonials or community voices early on.

feedback:
As the creator of Fox24Coin, I’m proud of the transparency and security of our project. Our service is mainly protected through Cloudflare, and additionally by our custom security code.

Regarding the visual design, there are a few minor elements that still need polishing, but it’s important to emphasize that the site was hand-coded, not based on a template, written entirely in a text editor and developer console. We also have many interesting tools and functions built into the site, which is a big plus.

Overall, I rate the site 6 stars, but we will continue working to achieve the full score. I encourage everyone to join the audit and share their feedback to help us improve even further!
suggestion:
Visual Refinements – There are a few minor visual elements that could be polished for a cleaner and more modern look.

Enhanced User Experience – Adding tooltips, guides, or small animations could help new users navigate the site more intuitively.

Performance Insights – While the site is fast and secure, monitoring load times on various devices could help optimize performance further.

Additional Features – Consider integrating small interactive features or dashboards to give users more insight into their activities.

Community Engagement – Encourage users to leave detailed feedback and suggestions by adding short prompts or hints within the audit form.

Overall, the site is strong in security and functionality, and these improvements could help elevate it to a perfect score.
